verses.verse: <S%H7971>Send<s%> ye the <S%H3733>lamb<s%> to the <S%H4910>ruler<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> from <S%H5554>Sela<s%> to the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>, unto the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion<s%>. Sela: or, Petra: Heb. A rock

For it shall be, that, as a <S%H5074>wandering<s%> <S%H5775>bird<s%> cast <S%H7971>out<s%> of the <S%H7064>nest<s%>, so the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be at the <S%H4569>fords<s%> of <S%H769>Arnon<s%>. cast: or, a nest forsaken

<S%H935>Take<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, <S%H6213>execute<s%> <S%H6415>judgment<s%>; <S%H7896>make<s%> thy <S%H6738>shadow<s%> as the <S%H3915>night<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H6672>noonday<s%>; <S%H5641>hide<s%> the <S%H5080>outcasts<s%>; <S%H1540>bewray<s%> not him that <S%H5074>wandereth<s%>. Take: Heb. Bring

Let mine <S%H5080>outcasts<s%> <S%H1481>dwell<s%> with thee, <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; <S%H1933>be<s%> thou a <S%H5643>covert<s%> to them from the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%>: for the <S%H4160>extortioner<s%> is at an <S%H656>end<s%>, the <S%H7701>spoiler<s%> <S%H3615>ceaseth<s%>, the <S%H7429>oppressors<s%> are <S%H8552>consumed<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%>. extortioner: Heb. wringer the oppressors: Heb. the treaders down

And in <S%H2617>mercy<s%> shall the <S%H3678>throne<s%> be <S%H3559>established<s%>: and he shall <S%H3427>sit<s%> upon it in <S%H571>truth<s%> in the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H8199>judging<s%>, and <S%H1875>seeking<s%> <S%H4941>judgment<s%>, and <S%H4106>hasting<s%> <S%H6664>righteousness<s%>. established: or, prepared

We have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%>; he is <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1341>proud<s%>: even of his <S%H1346>haughtiness<s%>, and his <S%H1347>pride<s%>, and his <S%H5678>wrath<s%>: but his <S%H907>lies<s%> shall not be so.

Therefore shall <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H3213>howl<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, every one shall <S%H3213>howl<s%>: for the <S%H808>foundations<s%> of <S%H7025>Kirhareseth<s%> shall ye <S%H1897>mourn<s%>; surely they are <S%H5218>stricken<s%>. mourn: or, mutter

For the <S%H7709>fields<s%> of <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%> <S%H535>languish<s%>, and the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>: the <S%H1167>lords<s%> of the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> have broken <S%H1986>down<s%> the principal <S%H8291>plants<s%> thereof, they are <S%H5060>come<s%> even unto <S%H3270>Jazer<s%>, they <S%H8582>wandered<s%> through the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: her <S%H7976>branches<s%> are stretched <S%H5203>out<s%>, they are gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3220>sea<s%>. stretched: or, plucked up

Therefore I will <S%H1058>bewail<s%> with the <S%H1065>weeping<s%> of <S%H3270>Jazer<s%> the <S%H1612>vine<s%> of <S%H7643>Sibmah<s%>: I will <S%H7301>water<s%> thee with my <S%H1832>tears<s%>, O <S%H2809>Heshbon<s%>, and <S%H500>Elealeh<s%>: for the <S%H1959>shouting<s%> for thy summer <S%H7019>fruits<s%> and for thy <S%H7105>harvest<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen<s%>. the shouting: or, the alarm is fallen upon, etc

And <S%H8057>gladness<s%> is taken <S%H622>away<s%>, and <S%H1524>joy<s%> out of the plentiful <S%H3759>field<s%>; and in the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> there shall be no <S%H7442>singing<s%>, neither shall there be <S%H7321>shouting<s%>: the <S%H1869>treaders<s%> shall tread <S%H1869>out<s%> no <S%H3196>wine<s%> in their <S%H3342>presses<s%>; I have made their vintage <S%H1959>shouting<s%> to <S%H7673>cease<s%>.
Wherefore my <S%H4578>bowels<s%> shall <S%H1993>sound<s%> like an <S%H3658>harp<s%> for <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and mine inward <S%H7130>parts<s%> for <S%H7025>Kirharesh<s%>.

And it shall come to pass, when it is <S%H7200>seen<s%> that <S%H4124>Moab<s%> is <S%H3811>weary<s%> on the high <S%H1116>place<s%>, that he shall <S%H935>come<s%> to his <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> to <S%H6419>pray<s%>; but he shall not <S%H3201>prevail<s%>.
This is the <S%H1697>word<s%> that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%> concerning <S%H4124>Moab<s%> since that <S%H227>time<s%>.

But now the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>spoken<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Within <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, as the <S%H8141>years<s%> of an <S%H7916>hireling<s%>, and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> shall be <S%H7034>contemned<s%>, with all that <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H1995>multitude<s%>; and the <S%H7605>remnant<s%> shall be <S%H4592>very<s%> <S%H4213>small<s%> and <S%H3808>feeble<s%> <S%H3524><s%>. feeble: or, not many
